scripts.build: if not exist build mkdir build && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=build/index.js --format=esm --minify --external:react --external:react-dom --external:react-router-dom --external:lucide-react --external:recharts && copy index.html build\ 2>nul && copy metadata.json build\ 2>nul && if exist public\assets (if not exist build\assets mkdir build\assets && xcopy /E /I /Y public\assets\* build\assets\ 2>nul)
scripts.start: echo 'Use a local development server that supports TSX or run the build script.'
